snippet: Some $60 million is expected to be spent in the Wisconsin governor’s recall race, an amount almost double that spent in the last gubernatorial election, in 2010.
abstract: Some $60 million is expected to be spent in the Wisconsin governor's recall race, an amount almost double what was spent in the last gubernatorial election in 2010, which broke spending records; about half of the total spending came from outside political groups.
lead_paragraph: Some $60 million is expected to be spent in the Wisconsin governor’s recall race, an amount almost double that spent in the last gubernatorial election, in 2010.

headline.seo: $60 Million Tab Seen in Wisconsin Recall Campaign
headline.main: Wisconsin Tops Itself in Big-Money Race
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin Tops Itself in Big-Money Race
